channel.title: [Hyperion] Project Zune-City
channel.description:
[font=comic sans ms][center] [B]A quick little introduction: [/B]
Welcome to my project. I'm JlStepper. My server will be called Zune-City, but might be changed later on, I dunno. I’m not good of a programmer, I’m not the best, I’m not the worst. I’m still learning, so please don’t flame. This server was based on a 459, I was just going through my computer and then I found some sources that I downloaded in the past. xD. I’m not really sure of the name, sorry. But here it is. Oh and this is Hyperion. I'mma post some features now. Edit: Okay I remember now, the source base was Gunthor, the client I still don't know, because my friend just said that he added a cache, edited signlink.java, then sent it to me. xD[/center]
[B]The features right now are the following: I might be missing some I think, but whatever, here it is:[/B]
- Working login screen - Start package with economy typed items - NPC spawning works - NPC fighting, combat - NPC walking just like any other server - NPC following when attacking - NPC clipped on areas - Combat system [Not perfect yet : P] - Facing in combat, not looking the other way - Message ‘something is already in combat’ - Anti dupe system [Still finding and fixing dupes] - Anti nulling system [Still working on it xD] - Character files saving - Character rights saving - Character location saving - Character bank saving - Multi pking areas - Single pking areas - Equipment statics - Weapons statics as well - Dropping item you don’t want - Picking up items you see xP - Shopping from stores - Selling items to general stores - Modern magics - Bank and deposit box - Barrow minigame at the moment - Running option works [Need to add energy left] - Running recharging by using walk option - Fishing system working - Shrimps, lobster, sharks, manta, tuna, etc - Cooking system working - Shrimps, lobster, sharks, manta, tuna, etc - Food will sometimes burn - Firemaking is working - Tinderbox and logs such as willow, maple - Mining system works - Mining certain ores [Need to add some others] - Rune essence mining - Prayer is working as well - Burying bones for levelling - Better bones, more experience - Woodcutting works as well - Axe on a tree for logs, oak, willow, yews - Trading other players [: )] - Accepting trade from players - Declining trade from players - Confirming trade from players - Offering number of items [1, 5, 10, X, All] - Personal messaging system - Adding friends and adding ignores [: D]
- More features coming soon, I think I’m missing some.
[B]Skills percentage, approximately: [/B]
- Attack: 100% - Hitpoints: 100% - Mining: 40% - Strength: 100% - Agility: 0% - Smithing: 90% - Defense: 100% - Herblore: 80% - Fishing: 100% - Ranging: 90% - Theiving: 80% - Cooking: 100% - Prayer: 100% - Crafting: 80% - Firemaking: 100% - Magic: 80% - Fletching: 70% - Woodcutting: 100% - Runecrafting: 40% - Slayer: 50% - Farming: 0%
[center][B]Some screenshots that I took, it’s not a lot : P:[/B]
[img]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/5883/snap6m.png[/img] [img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/697/snap7.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2318/snap4q.png[/img] [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/2843/snap2tg.png[/img] [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/7752/snap9r.png[/img] [img]http://www.jagos.org/satbanner.png[/img][/center]
[B]Credits, whoops, I almost forgot about it:[/B]
- Graham - Blake - BrettR - Brown - Vastico - Lothy - Miss Silabsoft - Scu11 - Sub - Sean - William - Tropius - Requa - S Quare Quxx

item.title: [Hyperion] Project Zune-City
item.dc:creator: @JlStepper JlStepper
item.description:
@JlStepper wrote:

[font=comic sans ms][center]
A quick little introduction:

Welcome to my project. I’m JlStepper. My server will be called Zune-City, but might be changed later on, I dunno. I’m not good of a programmer, I’m not the best, I’m not the worst. I’m still learning, so please don’t flame. This server was based on a 459, I was just going through my computer and then I found some sources that I downloaded in the past. xD. I’m not really sure of the name, sorry. But here it is. Oh and this is Hyperion. I’mma post some features now. Edit: Okay I remember now, the source base was Gunthor, the client I still don’t know, because my friend just said that he added a cache, edited signlink.java, then sent it to me. xD[/center]

The features right now are the following:
I might be missing some I think, but whatever, here it is:

  • Working login screen

  • Start package with economy typed items

  • NPC spawning works

  • NPC fighting, combat

  • NPC walking just like any other server

  • NPC following when attacking

  • NPC clipped on areas

  • Combat system [Not perfect yet : P]

  • Facing in combat, not looking the other way

  • Message ‘something is already in combat’

  • Anti dupe system [Still finding and fixing dupes]

  • Anti nulling system [Still working on it xD]

  • Character files saving

  • Character rights saving

  • Character location saving

  • Character bank saving

  • Multi pking areas

  • Single pking areas

  • Equipment statics

  • Weapons statics as well

  • Dropping item you don’t want

  • Picking up items you see xP

  • Shopping from stores

  • Selling items to general stores

  • Modern magics

  • Bank and deposit box

  • Barrow minigame at the moment

  • Running option works [Need to add energy left]

  • Running recharging by using walk option

  • Fishing system working

  • Shrimps, lobster, sharks, manta, tuna, etc

  • Cooking system working

  • Shrimps, lobster, sharks, manta, tuna, etc

  • Food will sometimes burn

  • Firemaking is working

  • Tinderbox and logs such as willow, maple

  • Mining system works

  • Mining certain ores [Need to add some others]

  • Rune essence mining

  • Prayer is working as well

  • Burying bones for levelling

  • Better bones, more experience

  • Woodcutting works as well

  • Axe on a tree for logs, oak, willow, yews

  • Trading other players [: )]

  • Accepting trade from players

  • Declining trade from players

  • Confirming trade from players

  • Offering number of items [1, 5, 10, X, All]

  • Personal messaging system

  • Adding friends and adding ignores [: D]

  • More features coming soon, I think I’m missing some.

Skills percentage, approximately:

  • Attack: 100%
  • Hitpoints: 100%
  • Mining: 40%
  • Strength: 100%
  • Agility: 0%
  • Smithing: 90%
  • Defense: 100%
  • Herblore: 80%
  • Fishing: 100%
  • Ranging: 90%
  • Theiving: 80%
  • Cooking: 100%
  • Prayer: 100%
  • Crafting: 80%
  • Firemaking: 100%
  • Magic: 80%
  • Fletching: 70%
  • Woodcutting: 100%
  • Runecrafting: 40%
  • Slayer: 50%
  • Farming: 0%

[center]Some screenshots that I took, it’s not a lot : P:






[/center]

Credits, whoops, I almost forgot about it:

  • Graham
  • Blake
  • BrettR
  • Brown
  • Vastico
  • Lothy
  • Miss Silabsoft
  • Scu11
  • Sub
  • Sean
  • William
  • Tropius
  • Requa
  • S Quare Quxx
